snippet.title: The Outbound Ghost Announcement Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2022
snippet.description: The Outbound Ghost is an adventure RPG about helping ghosts ascend to the afterlife. Learn more in this world premiere announcement trailer from The Future Games Show. Outbound Ghost, which is coming soon to PC, PlayStation, Switch, and Xbox.
